text: and within the last hour Ethiopia's

preliminary report into the crash last
month of an Ethiopian Airlines new
Boeing 737 max they found that pilots
repeatedly followed procedures
recommended by Boeing but were unable to
regain control of the plane the
Transport Minister recommends that
Boeing review the aircraft control
systems and that the plane be grounded
until aviation authorities can confirm
that the problem has been solved
